scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run run-gateway" "npm run run-categories" "npm run run-notes" "npm run run-users"
scripts.setup: npm run setup-gateway && npm run setup-categories && npm run setup-notes && npm run setup-users
scripts.setup-gateway: cd src && cd gateway && npm i
scripts.setup-categories: cd src && cd micro-services && cd categories && npm i
scripts.setup-notes: cd src && cd micro-services && cd notes && npm i
scripts.setup-users: cd src && cd micro-services && cd users && npm i
scripts.run-gateway: cd src && cd gateway && npm run dev
scripts.run-categories: cd src && cd micro-services && cd categories && npm run dev
scripts.run-notes: cd src && cd micro-services && cd notes && npm run dev
scripts.run-users: cd src && cd micro-services && cd users && npm run dev
scripts.deploy-gateway: cd src && cd gateway && npm run deploy
scripts.deploy-categories: cd src && cd micro-services && cd categories && npm run deploy
scripts.deploy-notes: cd src && cd micro-services && cd notes && npm run deploy
scripts.deploy-users: cd src && cd micro-services && cd users && npm run deploy
